Interface ConfiguredFacetedSearchFormSettingsWithOptions

    public interface ConfiguredFacetedSearchFormSettingsWithOptions
extends ConfiguredFacetedSearchFormSettings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMatchingAll()
      Defines whether the results should match all selected values in the facet (AND operator effect) or just at least one selected value (OR operator effect)
      boolean isMultiSelect()
      Defines whether multiple options can be selected or only one.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.commercetools.sunrise.search.facetedsearch.ConfiguredFacetedSearchFormSettings

        getAttributePath, getFieldLabel, getUIType, isCountDisplayed

    • Method Detail

      • isMultiSelect

        boolean isMultiSelect()
        Defines whether multiple options can be selected or only one.
        Returns:
        true if multiple values can be selected, false otherwise

      • isMatchingAll

        boolean isMatchingAll()
        Defines whether the results should match all selected values in the facet (AND operator effect) or just at least one selected value (OR operator effect)
        Returns:
        true if results should match all selected values, false otherwise
